participant_1.background:
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.
I want to learn how to train my dog to behave in a new country.
i want to take her on vacations one day.
I'm a musician who travels a lot, and I sometimes worry about my cats when I'm gone.

participant_2.background:
I love my job as an accountant, but I can't stand heights.
I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
i check my reflection in the mirror constantly.
I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!

content.text: Thanks! You too! Are you going to any events this weekend?
Yeah, I'm going to the pride parade with my friends.
That sounds fun! I'm too much of a loner to go to events like that by myself.
It's okay to be a loner! I'm just glad to have friends who are supportive of me.
Thanks, I appreciate that. What do you do for a living?
I'm a musician. I travel a lot for my job, which can be tough, but it's also a lot of fun.
That sounds like a really cool job! I'm an accountant, so I work in an office all day.
I've never been an accountant, but I can imagine it's pretty boring.
It can be, but it's also pretty challenging. I have to be really good at math and attention to detail.
I guess that's why you're so good at it!
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
I like to spend hours researching random topics online. I'm also really into fitness. I go to the gym every day and I love running.
That's awesome! I used to love running, but I don't have time for it anymore.
You should try to make time for it! It's a great way to relieve stress.
I know, I know. I'll try to get back into it.
Good! I'm sure you'll love it
